column4: hi all, for some reason, by apache2 process, when started up is like at 98% usage....
anyone hear of this before on Edgy?
so it starts, uses a lot of cpu ... then goes down to normal, low usage?
right now at 95, sometimes goes down to 88, but usually between 94 and 98
I notice that it's only one of the child processes that's doing this.... wanna see strace output?
okay, that is definatly not normal :)  what does the error_log and/or access_log say?
i'd not know what to make of an strace, sorry :(
are you hosting a lot of sites?
the error log and access log doesn't show anything strange or even corresponding to the hight load..
it's a closed system..... so only access from my private IP range
it's mainly for web development on my home PC........
could it be some run-away crazy script or something that a person (or robot crawler) found?
sorry, not sure what else i'd look at
I don't think so. It's not accessible from the outside world
I just killed that one process.... the other kids are ok... it seems to have solved the problem.. but I am not sure why it does that... I hate that
